title: Bobby Remembers His Friend Joe Diffie + Favorite Board Game Draft + Mike D Watches Frozen For The First Time
itunes:title: Bobby Remembers His Friend Joe Diffie + Favorite Board Game Draft + Mike D Watches Frozen For The First Time
description:
Bobby talks about his friend Joe Diffie who passed away on Sunday due to complications from coronavirus. Bobby revisits when he first met Joe, his favorite songs and the time they sang together in studio. We draft our favorite board games. Mike D reviews Frozen and Frozen 2. Morgan2 also gives her thoughts on The Godfather movies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
